headline: Meta Platforms (NasdaqGS:META) Sees Shares Rise 6% After US$800 Million Deal Rejected
summary: Meta Platforms (NasdaqGS:META) recently made headlines with its attempted acquisition of FuriosaAI, a Korean chip startup that opted for independence over an $800 million offer. This development comes at a time when the broader market is recovering, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq exhibiting slight upward trends. Despite mixed performances among tech giants and flat movements from some sector players, such as Nvidia, Meta managed a price move of 6% over the past week. This gain in Meta's stock...
